comments.body: you can move it to before `if` as just `docs = {}` line, this should read better.

This should probably be changed similarly to how I changed dump_keywords.  And actually, since these should be mandatory arguments, they should be switched away from options to positional arguments in both dump_keywords and dump_config as well.

Since I have to re-audit the code when conflicts happen, I'd like that to go in afterwards.  Do you think you understand what I'm asking for well enough to open a PR that builds on this one to do that and we can rebase and merge it once this PR is merged?
Sure, a separate PR sounds good.
